extension.name: S5 MailChimp Signup
extension.author: Shape5.com
extension.description: The S5 MailChimp Signup module allows you to easily add a MailChimp Newsletter signup to your site so users can signup via the forum and be auto added to any list you specify in the admin of the module.

field.label:
Instructions:

You'll need to get the following and enter below before using:

1. MailChimp API Key: Grab an API Key from http://admin.mailchimp.com/account/api/

2. MailChimp Unique List ID: You'll need to have a list created. Then go to Lists > Signup Forms > Embedded Forms. Look in the window of 'Copy/paste onto your site' and look through the code for the id of your list as shown: id=f4ed35b8c7'
